name: Brett Andrew Miotti - Hatch Show Print
description: What we have here is an amazing piece of art.Brett Andrew Miotti spent the last 7 months in Nashville, TN interning for the world famous HATCH SHOW PRINT Hatch Show Print is part of the Country Music Hall of Fame and has been around since 1879. For real! They specialize in the art of LETTERPRESS. If you don’t know what that means, do yourself and favor and go read all about the history of Hatch on their site and support them by buying a few of their legendary posters featuring the likes of BB King, Elvis, Hank Williams, Johnny Cash, etc. Brett perfected the craft and made posters for the likes of Ted Nugent, Interpol, ZZ Top etc. One of the last things Brett did was design a poster for P is for Panda. He even did a linoleum carving of the panda head to incorporate into the poster. This is an official Hatch Show Print. Even says so! We only got 50 of these bad boys. There are four varieties – 13 with green ink on chipboard, 12 with blue ink on chipboard, 13 with blue ink on light blue paper, 12 with green ink on light blue. They are 12.5 X 12.5 and only $12.00 – that includes a poster tube and shipping (for those in the U.S. of A. that is) As standard the profit is split into thirds. 1/3rd goes to Brett, 1/3rd goes to the Atlanta Printmakers Studio and 1/3rd goes to us. Get these while they are hot!
